document_data.mainbody:
Star was a horse from the Western Heartlands during the midâ€“14 century DR.
Circa the , Star was kept along with five other horses, Bandy, Cardinal, Ebony, Fowler, and Hopper, by the traveling company of the mages Druhallen, the married couple of Galimer and Rozta, while being cared for by their foster son Tiep.
